sentences.chinese: 布里甘加河上渡船过河的乘客。

sentences.english: The ferry ties up at the south slip.
You and Mommy used to take me on the ferryboat .
sentences.chinese: 你和妈妈常带我坐渡船去。

sentences.english: And there was the ferryboat full of people floating along down.
sentences.chinese: 渡船上挤满了人，正往下游漂来。

sentences.english: I've meandered now from the downtown ferry terminal up to the Pike Place Public Market.
sentences.chinese: 我从渡船停靠的渡口一直漫步到派克公共市场。
一条渡船把我们送到对岸。

sentences.english: The ferryboat took the passengers over to the island.
sentences.chinese: 渡船将乘客们送到岛上。

sentences.english: I wish you a pleasant crossing on the car ferry " prince albert".
sentences.chinese: 祝大家乘坐爱伯特王子号载车渡船横渡愉快。

sentences.english: She was going to Nanaimo to catch the ferry to the mainland.
sentences.chinese: 她准备去纳奈莫乘渡船回大陆。

sentences.english: The ferryboat will take you over.
sentences.chinese: 渡船又回到镇口摆渡去了。

sentences.english: Your brother left his bag of film on the ferryboat.
sentences.chinese: 你哥哥将他的旅行袋遗忘在渡船上了。

sentences.english: On a ferryboat in New York Harbor. We can see the Statue of Liberty.
sentences.chinese: 在纽约港的渡船上，我们可以看到远处的自由女神像。

sentences.english: It's also blamed for capsizing a ferry carrying more than 700 people.
sentences.chinese: 台风还掀翻了一个载有700多人的渡船。

sentences.english: Aleck took a ferry to escape.
sentences.chinese: 亚力克乘着渡船逃离了。

sentences.english: Boats cross incessantly and cost only a few cents per ride.
sentences.chinese: 渡船不断地渡到对岸去，每坐一次只化几角钱。

sentences.english: They feel vexed , for the ferryboat made them cross.
sentences.chinese: 他们觉得烦恼，是因为渡船使然。

definition: (of a boat) to reach the shore/to pull toward shore/close to shore/landfall
to embark/to travel by ship/to ferry
person who lives and makes a living on a boat/boatman/boat dweller
